original_title: Wu-Tang Clan: Old Skool Kung Fu
overview: Lyrical assassins, Wu-Tang Clan, present Old Skool Kung-Fu in this ass kickin' dub plate presentation. Method Man, O.D.B., The GZA and the rest of the Wu-Tang posse take a hard ride thru' their world of lyrics and the Kung-Fu Movies that they have sampled on their albums. The Wu-Tang crew also talk about the close association that the Movies have had on their music and lifestyle. "Da Mystery of Chess Boxing", Shaolin V. Wu-Tang", and "The 36 Chambers" are just some of the many Old Skool Kung-Fu Movies in this living show...
title: Wu-Tang Clan: Old Skool Kung Fu
